abstract: On Citigroup‘s conference call with analysts on Friday, the bank’s executives asserted that the firm’s split was “managerial” and that there are no plans, so far, to spin off or sell either branch.
lead_paragraph: On Citigroup‘s conference call with analysts on Friday, the bank’s executives asserted that the firm’s split was “managerial” and that there are no plans, so far, to spin off or sell either branch.
